content: stand out day or night by elevating your outfit with radiant crochet mesh sleeves stitched in red heart super glow you ll shine in the crowd with this chic layering piece a beginner pattern you ll learn double_crochet chain working in row flat slip_stitch seaming and more so easy to create make a selection of sleeves in different colors to match all your outfits materials red heart® super glow™ 1 8 oz/50 g 50 yds/46 m sizes s/m l spectral seafoam 2002 11 12 balls measurements approximately 64 162 5 cm wide from cuff-to-cuff x 10½ 12 26 5 30 5 cm down from shoulder after assembly
